channelType.description: Communication device number or electronic address used for communication: Fax, Email, Mobile, Phone.

CommunicationChannelName.description: Channel used to communicate with a party. Possible Values: Email, Fax, File, Online, PostalService, LiveSupport, ATM, IVR, Kiosk, Mobile, OnlineBanking, Phone, SMS, Card, InPerson, Operator, VRU, Telebanc, Notice, ExceptionReport, Statement, TextMessage, Teller, Walkin, Voice, Web, Retailer, WesternUnion, Electronic, CenterView.

CommunicationChannelIdentification.description: Communication value such as phone number or email address.

GenericContact.description: Communication device number or electronic address used for communication.

preferredMethod.description:
Preferred method used to reach the contact, in PascalCase form. Possible values are:  
Letter, Email, Phone, Fax, MobileOrCellPhone.

PreferredLanguage.description: Language of the contact person. Names according to the language list provided in the ISO 639-1 codes. Some possible values: Chinese, Spanish, French, English, Japanese, Italian, German, Default.

PaymentPartyContactDetails.description: Specifies the contact details of a person.
